entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
